about_the_game:
Your guild had built a base on Treasure Island in order to research Magical Beings! Their main objective? To find the storied gold of Treasure Island! Befriend a cavalcade of characters and creatures as you journey through Treasure Island in hopes of discovering the fabled fortune. But be careful... In addition to allies, you'll also meet adversaries like the enigmatic black market trader, Lex.

As a Monster Tamer, you'll have the skills to capture the many Magical Beings/Monster Girls on the island and have them join your party. There's strength in numbers, and you'll have plenty of cuties in your arsenal! You'll also have many stats and abilities to improve. In addition to the usual stats like attack power, agility, and magic defense, you can also use and strengthen passive skills! Figuring out the best time to level up and balance these many skills is all part of the adventure!

Passive Skills

These skills range from lockpicking to charisma. Upon leveling them up, you unlock additional content to enjoy across multiple playthroughs, including new dialogue options!

An Enthralling Legend

The truth behind the legend of Treasure Island is revealed to you bit by bit, keeping you on the edge of your seat!

Capturing Monster Girls

A key feature of the game is capturing the various Monster Girls on Treasure Island as a Monster Tamer. They come in various forms, each having unique powers and abilities. Train them, use them to fight in turn-based RPG combat, and try your best to capture them all!

name: RAKE IN - Scoring Big With Monster Girls!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: For generations, a legend has been passed down about the mysterious Treasure Island. The island is home to a vast amount of gold... and it could be yours for the taking! Embark on a Monster Girl-catching escapade as you uncover secrets in a riveting search for riches!
